title: EUNE NOT FIXED (emergency maintenance)
body:
The issues still persist, summoners cant ban champions, game acceptance bugs and freezes,
i cant get off the queue either.

replies.body: Oh snap that's not good. I'll pass this info along again, but in the meantime let's double check your network settings juuuuuust to make sure we cover all of our bases. Hit up our [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how to adjust your port forwarding and DNS settings and let me know if this keeps happening.
